      static void calculateFee(DataInterface dataInterface, int afm, double fee)

    • Method Detail

      • checkPlates

        public static void checkPlates(DataInterface dataInterface,
                               java.lang.String plate)
        This method calls the getStatus and prints the status of the given vehicle (expired, valid, and not found)
        Parameters:
        dataInterface - This object is the interface declaration and we call the getStatus method
        plate - The plate number of the given vehicle

      • checkExpVehicles

        public static void checkExpVehicles(DataInterface dataInterface,
                                    int days,
                                    int flag)
        This method calls getExpVehicle method and prints the plate numbers tha are going to expire at given num of days
        Parameters:
        dataInterface - This object is the interface declaration to call getExpVehicle method
        days - The number of days given by the user
        flag - Integer 1 or 2 to print data in console or in file, respectively

      • sortVehicles

        public static void sortVehicles(DataInterface dataInterface,
                                int flag)
        This method calls getAllVehicles method and prints the plate numbers sorted
        Parameters:
        dataInterface - This object is the interface declaration to call getAllVehicles method
        flag - Integer 1 or 2 to print data in console or in file, respectively

      • calculateFee

        public static void calculateFee(DataInterface dataInterface,
                                int afm,
                                double fee)
        This method calls getDriver method which returns a driver type object with the given afm. The object has an arraylist of driver's vehicles to find the number of expired insurances.
        Parameters:
        dataInterface - This object is the interface declaration to call getAllVehicles method
        afm - Afm number given by the user
        fee - amount of fee given by the user
